translations.name: The New Testament in Irish
translations.description: Tiomna Nua’ is a translation of the New Testament into Ulsters Irish by Cosslett Ó Cuinn, a minister of the Church of Ireland and professor of Biblical Greek. It is based on the Revised Standard Version in English and the original Greek. It has a distinct Ulster dialect. It was published in 1970 by Cumann Gaelach na hEaglaise (the ‘Irish Guild of the Church’ of Ireland) with the assistance of the Hibernian Bible Society.
